CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 27, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "...Many prominent local figures aided materially is making Pittsbrh's first indoor horse show at Hunt Armory a real success. The show was well attended and supported, marking another milestone in uplift of our community's organization. - Courier Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Boy wearing striped shirt, holding bridle of horse with large white blaze on face, in Hunt Armory during horse show
